snippet: Federal regulators identified no single cause of an hour of extreme volatility in the Treasuries market last fall.
abstract: Treasury Dept and four other regulatory agencies publish report on so-called flash rally of benchmark United States government bonds that occurred in October, 2014; event raised deep concerns about vulnerability of market for Treasury securities; five-agency group reports that they have better understanding of what transpired, but does not identify any single cause.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators identified no single cause of an hour of extreme volatility in the Treasuries market last fall.

headline.print_headline: Report Finds No Single Cause for a Volatile Hour of Treasury Pricing
